definitions.definition: A set of specified or traditional symbolic forms associated with the subject or theme of a stylized genre of art .
The art of representation by pictures or images; the description or study of portraiture or representation, as of persons.
The study of representative art in general.

main_definition: A set of specified or traditional symbolic forms associated with the subject or theme of a stylized genre of art .
secondary_definitions: The art of representation by pictures or images; the description or study of portraiture or representation, as of persons.
The study of representative art in general.
